oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Quartermaster account of Captain J. E. Ray, C. S. A., to Mr. Aaron Lambert

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Confederate States of America -- Army of Tennessee; Tennessee -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865; Foraging
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Quartermaster account, Confederate States, to Mr. Aaron Lambert for 11,840 pounds of hay. The amount of hay purchased during the month of July was 11,840 pounds of hay at $2.50 per 100 pounds- a payment of $296.00 to Aaron Lambert certified by Captain J. E. Ray, Quartermaster, C. S. A..
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Confederate States of America -- Quartermaster General's Office
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Regimental quartermasters often obtained forage from local farms and left vouchers that had to be redeemed.
